code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 55 yo male says he is having symptoms of moderate urinary frequency 2 x week, mostly during the day. he denies drinking alcohol Denies ever using tobacco o: Height 71 in, Weight 124 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 80 , SystolicBP 109 , DiastolicBP 67 , Respiration 15 , HbA1c HbA1c=9 %, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity , appears in NAD, age appropriate speech, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OS:20/100, normal pupillary reflex a: Type 2 Diabetes p: administered glyburide - 5 mg daily , performed HbA1c, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

s:a 55 year old male geographer c/o 2 weeks h/o mild deterioration of eye sight. NKDA. o: Height 71 in, Weight 127 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 81 , SystolicBP 114 , DiastolicBP 74 , Respiration 17 a: Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.

s:m aged 55 yrs presents with 3 weeks history of moderate urinary frequency, severe fatigue and moderate foamy urine . he denies ever using cigarettes consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily o: Height 192 cm , Weight 66.7 kg , Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 84 , SystolicBP 115 , DiastolicBP 76 , Respiration 17 , Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity , appears in NAD, age appropriate speech, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OS:20/100, normal pupillary reflex a: Type 2 Diabetes p: performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to endocrinology and administered Byetta - 10 mcg .

s:pt presents with 6 days history of moderate urinary hesitancy, moderate urinary frequency and moderate weak urinary stream. pt is a 56 yr old male geographer. o: Height 71 in, Weight 126 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 82 , SystolicBP 111 , DiastolicBP 72 , Respiration 17 , Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity , appears in NAD, age appropriate speech, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OS:20/100, normal pupillary reflex a: Type 2 Diabetes p: performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to endocrinology.

s:a 56 year old M geographer presents with moderate urinary frequency, moderate urinary hesitancy, moderate weak urinary stream and Diabetes . These symptoms are present for about 3 weeks. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol he denies ever using cigarettes o: Height 72 in, Weight 127 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 83 , SystolicBP 112 , DiastolicBP 74 , Respiration 18 , Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity , appears in NAD, age appropriate speech, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OS:20/100, normal pupillary reflex a: Type 2 Diabetes p: performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed glimepiride - 4 mg daily .

s:patient complained of moderate dark urine , mild abdominal pain and moderate yellowness in eyes . pt denied any fall or trauma . NKDA. he is a 56 year old m geographer. o: Height 192 cm , Weight 66.7 kg , Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 76 , SystolicBP 113 , DiastolicBP 71 , Respiration 17 a: Pancreatic Cancer p: performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed gemcitabine - 1000 mg/m2 IV, and ordered ERCP .
